ai-patthana12.18:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.18:0.3_0: Trembling like a vast fley who sees the great ocean,
ai-patthana12.18:2.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.18:2.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.18:3.1_0: that didn’t go for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha for three reasons, and for three reasons.
ai-patthana12.18:4.1_1: or his mind is not full of refuge.
ai-patthana12.18:5.1_0: They don’t understand the teaching for the sake of a refuge. ...
ai-patthana12.18:6.1_0: They don’t give rise to the teaching for refuge ...
ai-patthana12.18:6.1_1: mind doesn’t swept away the teaching.
ai-patthana12.18:6.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana12.18:7.1_0: his teaching is not produced by the mind.
ai-patthana12.18:7.1_1: They don’t give rise to the eighteen mental precious thoughts. ...
ai-patthana12.18:7.1_2: or rolling the refuge of the mind,
ai-patthana12.18:7.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana12.18:8.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.18:8.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.18:10.1_0: You should not give rise to the teaching for refuge,
ai-patthana12.18:10.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana12.18:11.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.18:11.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.18:12.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, the teaching, or the Saṅgha.
